tasks.name: ClassifySituationWithFrame
tasks.description: Top-level goal to classify a situation (e.g., a hotel room) using a frame structure.

tasks.name: IdentifyFrame
tasks.description: Select the most appropriate frame based on initial cues.

tasks.name: FillSlots
tasks.description: Assign fillers to the slots of the selected frame based on observation.

tasks.name: VerifyFit
tasks.description: Check if the filled frame satisfies the constraints of the stereotypical situation.

tasks.name: CompleteGoal
tasks.description: Goal invoked when classification is successful.
